text:
WHOA! THAT LAST
MULTIPLE CHOICE
QUESTION

WAS REALLY HARD!
I GOT "A."

I GOT "D,"
AND I'M PRETTY SURE
I'M RIGHT.

"D" WASN'T
EVEN CLOSE.

WHY ARE YOU SO SURE
YOU'RE RIGHT?

NO. I GOT A "D"
ON THE TEST.

I'M SURE I'M RIGHT
ABOUT THAT.

OH, LOOK.
GIGI'S HANDING OUT
INVITATIONS
TO HER ANNUAL TEA.

I'M SO GLAD WE'RE
NOT INVITED

BECAUSE THEN WE'D
HAVE TO TALK
LIKE THIS--

[BRITISH ACCENT]
HULLO, MUMSIE.
HULLO, POPSIE.

ISN'T THIS
A LOVELY TEA?

DO YOU THINK
MY PINKY'S
HIGH ENOUGH?

[BRITISH ACCENT]
NO. HIGHER LIKE THIS

BECAUSE IF YOU'RE GOING
TO A FANCY TEA,

YOU NEED TO ACT LIKE
YOU'VE SMELT
SOMETHING TERRIBLE.

GOOD AFTERNOON,
ALEX, HARPER.

HOW'S THIS LOVELY DAY
BEEN TREATING YOU SO FAR?

[REGULAR VOICE]
WHAT HAPPENED
TO YOUR FACES?

APPLY YOUR MAKEUP
WITH A HAMMER?

THAT IS REALLY FUNNY,
ALEX, BUT INCORRECT.

WHAT YOU SEE
IS THE RESULT
OF A NEW METHOD

WHERE THEY INJECT
STUFF INTO YOUR
FOREHEAD.

THEN IN A FEW DAYS
IT FALLS DOWN
INTO YOUR CHEEKBONES.

WAIT A MINUTE.
TIMEOUT.

WHY AREN'T YOU
FIGHTING BACK?

WE JUST BAGGED
ON YOUR FACES,

WHICH SHOULD BE
IN A BAG.

SEE? I DID IT AGAIN.
WHY AREN'T YOU INSULTING ME?

REMEMBER, WE DON'T
LIKE EACH OTHER.

OH, BUT THAT WAS
BACK WHEN WE WERE
YOUNG AND FOOLISH.
THAT WAS YESTERDAY.
MY POINT EXACTLY.

THAT'S WHY I'M
INVITING YOU BOTH
TO MY TEA THIS WEEKEND.

YOUR TEA?
I'VE ALWAYS
WANTED TO GO.

THANKS, GIGI.
THIS IS GREAT!
WHAT?!

WELL, I HOPE YOU GUYS
CAN MAKE IT.

COME, GIRLS.
LET'S GO MAKE FUN
OF EDDIE TILL HE CRIES.

ALEX, I'VE ALWAYS
WANTED TO GO
TO A HIGH TEA.

I LOVE THE IDEA
OF EATING

TINY, LITTLE
SANDWICHES!

YOU'RE SERIOUS?
I DON'T MEAN TO
SOUND UNSUPPORTIVE,

BUT ARE YOU OUT
OF YOUR MIND, WOMAN?!

GIGI HAS TERRORIZED US
SINCE WERE IN KINDERGARTEN.

WELL, I THINK
GIGI'S TAKING
THE HIGH ROAD,

AND I WANT TO
REACH OUT TO HER,

AND IF YOU WANT TO
BE A NEGATIVE NELLIE,
THEN GO AHEAD.

OK. THE ONLY NELLIE
I KNOW IS NELLIE RODRIGUEZ,

AND SHE'S A VERY POSITIVE,
UPBEAT PERSON.

HI, NELLIE!
YOU GOING
TO GIGI'S TEA?

YEAH! I CAN'T WAIT!
IT'S GONNA BE SO MUCH FUN!
HEE HEE HEE!

SO WHAT ARE YOU
GONNA WEAR?

UGH! THERE'S NOTHING WORSE
THAN A POSITIVE NELLIE.

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THAT THE END WILL, NO DOUBT,
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪
♪ YES, PLEASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO OUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪
♪ THAT'S WHAT I SAID ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪
♪ IN YOUR WILDEST DREAMS ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ EVERYTHING IS NOT
WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE
WHAT YOU WANT ♪
♪ BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU
WON'T LET ME GO
INTO THE LAIR!
YOU'RE BUNK!

I'M NOT THE ONE
WHO SAID YOU

CAN'T GO
IN THE LAIR.

DAD SAID NO ONE
CAN WHILE HE'S
OUT OF TOWN.
CALL ME BUNK.

THEN HOW AM I SUPPOSED
TO STUDY

THESE NEW
POCKET SPELL BOOKS

THAT DAD'S GONNA
QUIZ US ON
WHEN HE GETS HOME?

YOU'LL STUDY LIKE YOU
DO FOR REGULAR SCHOOL.

YOU'LL SIT HERE
AND DO YOUR WORK,
AND I'LL DO MINE.

WITH YOUR DAD GONE
FOR THE WEEKEND,

I PROMISED I'D DO
THE BANK DEPOSIT.

I CAN'T BELIEVE
DAD'S MAKING US
MEMORIZE 20 SPELLS.

IT'S LIKE HE'S GONE
BUT HE'S NOT GONE.
[GRUNTS]

CAN YOU AT LEAST STOP
SHAKING YOUR LEG?

I'M TRYING
TO CONCENTRATE.

SHAKING MY LEG'S
HOW I CONCENTRATE.
CUT IT OUT!
THAT'S HOW I CONCENTRATE.

GUYS, PLEASE.
I'M TRYING TO DO
THIS DEPOSIT.

I KNOW. ISN'T MAX
SO ANNOYING?

YOU'RE THE ONE WHO
FLICKED MY EAR.
OH. YOU MEAN LIKE THIS?

OK. THAT'S IT!
THAT'S IT!

COME ON! YOU GUYS
ARE GONNA STUDY
YOUR MAGIC IN THE LAIR!
COME ON.

SEE? WE CAN'T EVEN
GET IN IF WE WANT.
DAD PUT A LOCK ON IT.

THERE'S PROBABLY SOME
KIND OF COMPLICATED

MAGICAL SPELL
ON THE LOCK

THAT WE'LL NEVER
BE ABLE TO BREAK.

OR A GIANT KEY
HANGING ON A HOOK
RIGHT HERE.

I THOUGHT THAT WAS
A DECORATION.

COME ON.
GET IN THE LAIR

AND DON'T TELL
YOUR DAD I LET
YOU IN THERE.

YOU KNOW WHAT
TODAY'S A GREAT
DAY FOR?

TODAY'S A GREAT DAY
FOR THROWING MYSELF
INTO WORK.

TAKE ORDERS
AND NOT TALK
ABOUT MY PROBLEMS.

SLICE SALAMI
AND NOT TALK
ABOUT MY PROBLEMS.

BE NICE
TO RUDE CUSTOMERS

AND NOT TELL THEM
ABOUT MY PROBLEMS.

YOU KNOW ME--SERVICE
WITH A SMILE.

OH, HONEY.
YOU SOUND LIKE YOU

WANT TO TALK
ABOUT YOUR PROBLEMS.

MOM, WHY ARE YOU
ALWAYS IN MY
BUSINESS?
OK. FINE!

ALL RIGHT.
I'LL TELL YOU.

GIGI INVITED
HARPER AND I
TO HER TEA,

BUT HARPER'S
GONNA GO.

SHE THINKS GIGI'S
NICE ALL OF A SUDDEN.

WELL, PEOPLE CHANGE.
MAYBE GIGI IS NICER.

MOM, IF I'M GONNA TELL
YOU ABOUT MY PROBLEMS,

YOU HAVE TO AGREE
WITH THEM.

OK. OK. GIGI--
HORRIBLE, MEAN.
I KNOW. ISN'T SHE?

BUT HARPER DOESN'T
THINK SO,

SO I GUESS HARPER
AND I AREN'T
FRIENDS ANYMORE.

OH, DON'T SAY THAT.
YOU AND HARPER

HAVE BEEN FRIENDS
FOREVER,

AND YOU'LL ALWAYS
BE FRIENDS.

YOU'LL JUST
HAVE YOUR UPS
AND YOUR DOWNS.

RIGHT. LIKE WHEN
WE WERE 9

AND WE HAD
THE LEMONADE STAND

AND HARPER KEPT
ALL THE MONEY.

WELL, SHE DID DO
ALL THE WORK.
MOM!
SORRY, SORRY.

WHERE'S THE SPELL
TO GET YOU TO STOP
SHAKING YOUR LEG?

WIZARD MAIL?
YOU KNOW, WE ALWAYS
GET WIZARD MAIL,

BUT WE'VE NEVER SENT
ANY OUT.
YOU'RE RIGHT.

LET'S SEND OUT
SOME PRANK MAIL.

AHH. "STRANDED
ON A DESERTED
ISLAND IN...
IN THE LAVA SEA."
THERE'S A LAVA SEA?

I DON'T KNOW.
IT'S PRANK MAIL.
GOT IT, GOT IT.

ALL WE HAVE TO EAT
IS HOT ROCKS.

I LIKE YOUR
THINKING.
AND NOW...

BOOP--WE SEND OUT
OUR FIRST PIECE
OF WIZARD MAIL!
♪ DA DA DA DA ♪
COOL! NOW WHAT?
NOW WE WAIT.

WHOO! WELL, NOW
WE'RE HAVING FUN, HUH?
THIS IS AWESOME!

HEY.
HI, HARPER!

HEY, HARPER.
WHAT'S UP?

OH! GIGI INVITED ME
TO A SLEEPOVER.

SHE WANTS ME TO
MAKE MY LITTLE
SNICKERDOODLES,

YOU KNOW THE ONES
WITH THE RED HOT
CANDIES.

OBVIOUSLY, SHE
REALLY WANTS TO
BE MY FRIEND.
IT'S UNBELIEVABLE.

YEAH. IT'S UNBELIEVABLE
AS IN I DON'T BELIEVE IT.

I MEAN, COME ON.
HAVE YOU SEEN
ANYONE FINISH

ONE OF YOUR
SPICY SNICKERDOODLES?

IT'S GIGI.
SHE DOESN'T LIKE US.

IF SHE INVITES YOU
TO HER SLUMBER PARTY,

IT'S JUST TO PUT
WHIP CREAM IN YOUR HAND
WHILE YOU'RE SLEEPING

AND THEN TICKLE
YOUR NOSE.

I THOUGHT YOU WERE
GONNA BE SUPPORTIVE.

I AM! I ATE
YOUR SNICKERDOODLES

THE FIRST TIME
YOU MADE THEM.
WHAT'S THAT?

IT'S THE CROWN
WE'RE GONNA PRESENT

TO THE BEST NEWCOMER
AT THE TEA.
OH! CAN I SEE IT?

OH, NO, NO, SILLY.
IT'S A SURPRISE.
I CAN'T WAIT!
NEITHER CAN WE!
SOMETHING'S UP.

"SOME PEOPLE ARE A GEM,
SOME PEOPLE ARE A RAT.

TO LEARN WHO'S WHO
GIVE ME THE EAR OF A BAT."

OH, MY GOSH!
HARPER CAME SO CLOSE
TO SEEING THE CROWN!
I WANT TO SEE IT!
OK.
DO YOU SEE THE "L"?
IT STANDS FOR LOSER,

AND IT'S GONNA LOOK
SO GOOD ON HARPER

WHEN SHE'S CROWNED
THE BIGGEST LOSER.

YEAH, AT OUR WHO CAN BRING
THE BIGGEST LOSER PARTY!
[ALL GIGGLING]

WHAT DOES THIS ONE
SMELL LIKE?

THE STUFF THAT GROWS
BETWEEN YOUR TOES

MIXED WITH A LITTLE
EAR WAX.

AMAZING.
YOU'RE RIGHT.
THE BOTTLE'S BACK!
WHAT'S IT SAY?

"WE'VE RECEIVED
YOUR PLEA FOR HELP.

"DO NOT MOVE
OR LEAVE THE ISLAND.

THE HOT LAVA SEA
WILL BURN YOU UP."
GOOD TO KNOW.

"EMERGENCY WIZARDS
WILL ARRIVE TO
RESCUE YOU SOON."
THEY BOUGHT IT.

"PLEASE USE
THE EMERGENCY
SUPPLIES

TO STAY ALIVE
UNTIL WE ARRIVE."

THERE AREN'T ANY
EMERGENCY SUPPLIES.

THEY'RE PRANKING US
BACK.

"EMERGENCY
WIZARD SUPPLIES."
OH! A LIFE RAFT.

I WONDER IF IT'S
A MAGICAL LIFE RAFT.

WOW! EMERGENCY
WIZARDS ARE COMING.

THEY THINK WE'RE
REALLY IN TROUBLE. HA!

UH, MAX,
EMERGENCY WIZARDS
ARE COMING.

WE REALLY ARE
IN TROUBLE!

WELL, MAYBE THERE'S
A CHANCE THEY
WON'T FIND US.
[SIREN]

WHAT ARE YOU WEARING
THOSE GLOVES FOR?

I'M GETTING USED TO
THEM FOR GIGI'S TEA.

I NEED TO PRACTICE
HANDLING THINGS.
WHY?
THAT'S WHY.

AREN'T YOU GONNA
HELP ME?

WHY? THEY'RE ALREADY
BRUISED.

HARPER, MAYBE YOU
SHOULDN'T GO
TO GIGI'S TEA.

IT--IT'S REALLY
A WHO CAN BRING
THE BIGGEST LOSER CONTEST.

BIGGEST LOSER
CONTEST.

ALEX, I CAN'T
BELIEVE YOU'RE
MAKING STUFF UP.
IT'S JUST SAD.

I'M NOT MAKING IT UP.
I HEARD GIGI SAY IT.

OH, ALEX. I KNOW YOU
WANTED TO HEAR THAT,

BUT WE ALL WANT TO
HEAR A LOT OF THINGS

WE'RE NEVER GOING
TO HEAR.

YOU'RE NEVER GONNA
BELIEVE ME, ARE YOU?
ALEX, ALEX, ALEX.

REAL FRIENDS ACCEPT
EACH OTHER BRANCHING OUT.

THEY DON'T GET
COMPETITIVE
AND JEALOUS

AND MAKE UP
RIDICULOUS STORIES.

SO YOU'RE GOING
TO THAT TEA

NO MATTER
WHAT I SAY?
YES, I AM.

I CAN'T BELIEVE
I'M DOING THIS,
BUT I'M GOING, TOO.
OH, MY GOSH!

YEP. YOU'RE
MY FRIEND,

SO I HAVE TO BE
WITH YOU THROUGH
THICK AND THIN,

AND I HAVE A FEELING
THAT THIS TEA'S
GONNA BE THICK

OR THIN,
WHICHEVER ONE'S BAD.

THANK YOU, ALEX!
THIS IS GONNA BE AWESOME!

WE CAN SUPPORT
EACH OTHER.

I'LL COME OVER
4 HOURS BEFORE TEA
FOR A PRE-TEA TEA,

AND THEN WE CAN GET
DRESSED TOGETHER

AND PRACTICE
OUR MANNERS--

HOW ABOUT I MEET
YOU THERE?

HEY, MOM.
WE WERE JUST WONDERING

IF MAYBE WE COULD
GO TO GRANDMA'S.
OH? WHY?

WHY? BECAUSE WE
PULLED A PRANK

AND NOW EMERGENCY
WIZARDS ARE AFTER US.
LOOK. IT'S NOT THAT BAD.

WE JUST SENT
A PRANK MESSAGE
IN A BOTTLE

THROUGH THE WIZARD MAIL
SAYING WE NEEDED HELP,

AND EMERGENCY WIZARDS
RESPONDED,
SAYING THEY'RE COMING.
OHH!
OK. IT'S BAD.

YOU GUYS ARE
IN AN ENORMOUS
AMOUNT OF TROUBLE!

WE KNOW, WE KNOW.
I WISH WE NEVER
WOULD HAVE ASKED
TO GO INTO THE LAYER

AND YOU NEVER WOULD
HAVE LET US IN.

YEP. IT'S REALLY
YOUR FAULT. HEH HEH!

WELL, MAYBE WE
CAN GO STAY
AT GRANDMA'S.
LADIES...

WELCOME TO TEA
AT THE HOTEL FLEUR-DE-VLA
DE-VLA FLU-FLA DE-VLA.

THE HOTEL WHAT?
HOW DO YOU
SPELL THAT?
IN FRENCH.

WE ARE PROUD
TO PRESENT THIS TEA

SERVED TO YOU
ON THE FINEST CHINA
IMPORTED FROM JAPAN,

HOSTED BY YOUNG
MISS GIGI HOLLINGSWORTH.

I KNOW YOU'LL ACT
IN THE MOST
LADYLIKE FASHION.

ENJOY YOUR TEA HERE
AT THE HOTEL FLEUR-DE-VLA
DE-VLA FLU-FLA DE-VLA.

REMIND ME TO STOP
AT THE GIFT SHOP

AND GET A T-SHIRT
WITH THE HOTEL'S
NAME ON IT.

HARPER, ALEX,
I AM SO GLAD YOU GUYS
COULD MAKE IT.

I MEAN, YOUR ATTENDANCE
IS GONNA MAKE THIS

THE MOST SPECIAL TEA
I'VE EVER HAD.

WELL, THANKS, GIGI.
I'M SO GLAD YOU
INVITED ME.

OH, NOT AS GLAD
AS I AM.
ATTENTION, EVERYONE.
[CLINKING]

OK, THEN. WELL, NOW
THAT WE'VE ALL HAD
A CHANCE TO MINGLE,

I HAVE A HUGE ANNOUNCEMENT
I'D LIKE TO MAKE

LET'S GO LOOK
AT THE LADIES ROOM.

I HEAR IT'S
SO FANCY,

THE TOILET'S FILLED
WITH BOTTLED WATER.

PLUS THE SOAPS
LOOK LIKE LITTLE
SEASHELLS.
OH, I LOVE THOSE!

BUT I REALLY
SHOULD STAY.

I THINK GIGI'S GONNA SAY
SOMETHING IMPORTANT.
SHE USUALLY DOES.

AND NOW IT'S TIME
TO ANNOUNCE THE BEST NEWCOMER

AND PRESENT HER
WITH A SPECIAL CROWN.

I REALLY THINK
WE SHOULD GO.

IF WE DON'T GO SOON,
THE SOAPS WILL
GET USED

AND JUST BE
SOAPY LUMPS.

LOOK! I DON'T CARE
ABOUT YOUR SOAPY LUMPS!

I CAN'T LET
THIS HAPPEN.

TRUTH SPELL,
TRUTH SPELL.

"SOME ARE EVIL,
SOME ARE KIND,

BUT NOW ALL MUST
SPEAK THEIR MIND."

IF MY PARENTS COULD
AFFORD THE SAME
DERMATOLOGIST AS GIGI,

I'D BE WAY PRETTIER
THAN HER.

OH, MY GOSH!
DID I JUST SAY THAT?

AFTER I CLEAN
MY EARS, I LOOK.

OH! WHAT'S WRONG
WITH ME?

PLEASE PICK ME
FOR BEST NEWCOMER.

PLEASE, PLEASE,
OH, PRETTY PLEASE
WITH A CHERRY ON TOP.

I HOPE THIS ISN'T
ONE OF THOSE
LOSER TEAS.

IT WILL BE THE FIFTH
ONE I'VE BEEN TO
THIS YEAR.

JENNIFER LOOKS
WAY PRETTIER THAN ME!

I'M GONNA TALK HER
INTO A BAD HAIRCUT.

HEY, JEN. I'M GONNA
TALK YOU INTO
A BAD HAIRCUT.
WHY DID I JUST SAY THAT?

OH. THIS IS GOING
BETTER THAN
I THOUGHT.

HEY, EVERYBODY,
I'M WIZARD!
All: HUH?

YOU GUYS GOT
EVERYTHING?

I CALLED GRANDMA,
AND SHE'S BLOWING UP
OUR MATTRESSES.

SO WHEN YOUR DAD
GETS BACK ON MONDAY,

WE HAVE TO MAKE
SURE WE HAVE OUR
STORIES STRAIGHT.
[SIREN]

OR WE COULD GET
OUR STORIES
STRAIGHT NOW!

OFFICER LAMP.
THIS IS MY PARTNER.
HE'S A GOBLIN.
I HAVE A NAME.

YEAH, BUT NOBODY
CAN PRONOUNCE THAT.
WE'RE EMERGENCY WIZARDS.

I HAVE A REPORT HERE
OF SOMEONE USING
THE WIZARD MAIL

TO REQUEST
EMERGENCY SERVICES

WHEN, IN FACT,
NO SERVICES
WERE REQUIRED.

YEAH.
THEY PRANKED US.

THAT'S WHAT
I JUST SAID.

WELL, YOU TOOK
TOO LONG, YOU KNOW?

WE'RE JUST
AN ORDINARY FAMILY.

YOU GUYS GOT
THE WRONG BOYS.

THIS IS THE RUSSO FAMILY
OF WAVERLY PLACE,
NEW YORK, NEW YORK,

HOME TO WIZARDS
IN TRAINING

JUSTIN, ALEX,
AND MAX?

THESE ARE NOT THE DROIDS
YOU'RE LOOKING FOR.
WHAT ARE YOU DOING?

NOTHING. I FIGURED
I'D GIVE IT A SHOT.

OK. I SEE.
WAS THAT SHORT
ENOUGH FOR YOU?

OH, NOW WE'RE DOING
SHORT JOKES?

GUYS, SO I GUESS
WE'RE COOL THEN.
YEAH. WE'RE COOL

JUST AFTER WE ASK
YOU A FEW QUESTIONS
INDIVIDUALLY!

DID YOU JUST SAY
YOU'RE A WIZARD?

I WANT TO SAY NO,
BUT, YES, I DID SAY
I WAS A WIZARD.

YOU THINK YOU'RE
A WIZARD.

YEAH, BUT
EVERYBODY'S SAYING

CRAZY STUFF
RIGHT NOW.

I WANT GIGI TO
SAY SOME STUFF
TO YOU NOW.

THE TRUTH IS,
I HATE WEARING
THIS DRESS!

YOU WANT TO KNOW
WHAT I WANT TO DO?

I WANT TO
BREAK THIS.

DO IT!
DO IT!
THAT FELT GOOD.

YOU KNOW WHAT I'VE ALWAYS
REALLY WANTED TO DO?
THIS.
GREAT IDEA, GIGI!

THAT LOOKS LIKE FUN!
AAH!
AAH! AAH!
STOP, STOP!

ALL I WANTED IS A TEA
WITH SANDWICHES AND GLOVES

AND SMALL TALK THAT
NO ONE WOULD REMEMBER
WHEN THEY GOT HOME.

WELL, THAT ISN'T
WHAT THIS
TEA'S ABOUT,

AND I KNOW YOU
WON'T BELIEVE ME,

BUT YOU'RE GONNA
HAVE TO BELIEVE
GIGI.
GIGI!
LADIES, LADIES.

FINALLY, SOMEONE
TO RESTORE ORDER.

NO! HERE'S SOMETHING
I'VE ALWAYS WANTED TO DO.
[GASPING]
WHOO! WHOO!

HOW YOU DOING
TODAY, MAX?
I'M FINE, THANKS.

IS IT OK IF I
CALL YOU MAXY?

I GOT A NOTE HERE
THAT SAYS THEY SOMETIMES
CALL YOU MAXY.

YEAH. MAXY'S COOL.
I'M TRYING OUT
MAXIMILIAN, THOUGH,
SEE IT CATCHES ON.
THAT'S GREAT, MAXY.

I GUESS IT'S NOT
CATCHING ON.
ARE THOSE SHOES NEW?

NO. YOU SURE YOU DON'T
WANT TO TRY OUT MAXIMILIAN?

I'M DONE
WITH HIM, GOBLIN.
GET HIM OUT OF HERE!

SO, JUSTIN, WORD
ON THE STREET IS

THAT YOU'RE
THE BEST STUDENT,

REGULAR
AND WIZARD SCHOOL.
I DO OK.

I GUESS THAT MEANS
YOU'RE SMART ENOUGH
TO REALIZE

THAT MAXY--CUTE KID--
TOLD US THE WHOLE STORY,

AND IF YOUR STORY
DOESN'T EXACTLY
MATCH HIS,

WELL, WE'RE GONNA
HAVE A PROBLEM.

I DON'T KNOW WHAT
YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT.
WE DIDN'T DO ANYTHING.
GET OUT OF HERE!
I'LL GO WHEN I'M READY.
[SPEAKING GIBBERISH]
I'LL GO, I'LL GO!

THERESA RUSSO,
MORTAL,

MARRIED TO FORMER WIZARD
JERRY RUSSO.

YEAH. YOU HAVE
A COUPLE
OF NICE KIDS.

WE DID IT!
I MEAN, THEY DID IT,

BUT I LET THEM
INTO THE LAYER,
SO I GUESS WE DID IT.

"WE," "I,"
WHO WAS IT LADY?

IT WAS ME,
BUT THEY DROVE ME TO IT!

THERE WAS LEG-SHAKING
AND EAR-FLICKING,

AND I HAD TO DO
THE BANK DEPOSIT.

DO YOU HAVE ANY IDEA
HOW HARD IT IS

TO RUN A BUSINESS
FROM YOUR HOME?

TELL YOU WHAT
WE'RE GONNA DO.

YOU'RE GONNA LET ME OFF
WITH A WARNING

BECAUSE I'M A WIZARD
AND I DIDN'T KNOW
ANY BETTER.

WHAT, ARE YOU LIVING
IN A FANTASY WORLD?
I FEEL SO FREE!

I HATE THE HOTEL FLEUR-DE-VLA
DE-VLA FLU-FLA DE-VLA.

STOP IT!
YOU HAVE NO MANNERS!

I KNOW THIS ISN'T
GOING THE WAY
YOU WANTED TO,

BUT THIS IS WHAT
HAD TO HAPPEN.

GIGI, WHY DON'T YOU
TELL EVERYBODY

THE REAL REASON WHY
YOU HAD THIS STUPID TEA
IN THE FIRST PLACE?

OK. THAT'S EASY!
SEE, THE TRUTH IS

IS THAT THIS TEA'S
REALLY A CONTEST

TO SEE WHO CAN BRING
THE BIGGEST LOSER,
AND I BROUGHT HARPER.

SHE WAS JUST ABOUT
TO BE CROWNED WINNER.

YOU THINK I'M
THE BIGGEST LOSER?

SO ALL
THE SLEEPOVERS
AND SNICKERDOODLES,
THAT WAS A LIE.

YEAH. WE WERE JUST
TRYING TO STRING YOU ALONG

AND GET YOU TO COME
TO THIS LOSER TEA.

AND YOU DIDN'T COME
FOR THE TEA.

YOU CAME TO
PROTECT ME.

I'LL ALWAYS PROTECT YOU.
IT'S WHAT WE DO.

YOU KNOW, ITS FUNNY.
YOU BROUGHT NELLIE

WHEN NELLIE REALLY
SHOULD HAVE BROUGHT YOU.

SEE THAT? GIGI THINKS
YOU'RE A BIGGER LOSER,

AND YOU'RE SUPPOSEDLY
HER FRIEND.

OH! YOU THINK
I'M A LOSER?

WELL, THIS IS WHAT
I THINK OF YOU.

NOW WHAT DO YOU WANT
TO DO WITH THAT CAKE?
I WANT TO EAT IT.

OK. WHAT'S THE SECOND
THING YOU WANT TO DO
WITH THAT CAKE?
THROW IT AT GIGI.
AAH!
[SOBBING]

I DON'T LIKE
GIGI EITHER!
HERE.

I THINK THAT IT'S
TIME THAT GIGI
GETS A TASTE

OF WHAT SHE'S BEEN
DISHING ONTO ALL
OF US FOR YEARS!
AAH!
[CHEERING]

STOP, EVERYBODY.
STOP.

I HONESTLY THINK
I MAY HAVE GONE TOO FAR.
YOU THINK?

BUT I KNOW SOMEONE
WHO HASN'T--HARPER.

YOU WANT ME TO WEAR
THE LOSER CROWN?
WELL, OK.
NO.
OH. OK.

WELL, IT'S NOT
EXACTLY THE TEA
I IMAGINED,

BUT I'LL NEVER
FORGET IT.
LET'S GO HOME.

NOT YET. THERE'S
SOMETHING I SAW

THAT I KIND OF
WANT TO DO
BEFORE WE LEAVE.

WHOO!
WHEE!

YOU GUYS KNOW YOU
HAVE TO CLEAN
ALL THIS UP, RIGHT?
WE KIND OF FIGURED.
